title: Create enhanced loop.sh with beads integration
description:
## Context
The core loop script that orchestrates Ralph iterations, enhanced to use beads for exit conditions.

## References
- Original: https://github.com/ClaytonFarr/ralph-playbook/blob/main/files/loop.sh
- Draft: docs/ralph-beads-plan.md (Phase 1.1)

## Approach
1. Copy original loop.sh structure
2. Replace IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md check with bd ready check
3. Add iteration counter tracking per issue
4. Add stuck detection (3 attempts threshold)
5. Capture test exit codes for verification
6. Add mode selection (plan/build)

- [ ] Iteration counter persists across loop iterations | MANUAL | Check .ralph-attempts file

title: Create PROMPT_build.md with test-first and verification
description:
## Context
Building mode prompt that implements from beads queue with test scaffolding first.

## References
- Original: https://github.com/ClaytonFarr/ralph-playbook/blob/main/files/PROMPT_build.md
- Draft: docs/ralph-beads-plan.md (Phase 1.3)

## Approach
1. Step 0: Orient with bd ready, bd show
2. Step 1: Claim work with bd update --status in_progress
3. Step 1.5 (NEW): Create test scaffolding before implementation
4. Step 2: Implement with subagents
5. Step 3: Validate against acceptance criteria (run verification commands)
6. Step 4: Handle discovered work (can add deps, NOT remove)
7. Step 5: Close with verification evidence
8. Add guardrails for separation of powers

- [ ] Close requires evidence of verification | `grep -q 'close.*reason\|--reason' files/PROMPT_build.md` | 0
